ValidationRule.description: Lead Management can be enabled only if Deal Registration is enabled
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Deal_Registration_Enabled__c, "No"), ISPICKVAL(Deal_Registration_Enabled__c, "") ) , OR( ISPICKVAL(Lead_Management_Enabled__c, "Yes") , ISPICKVAL(Lead_Management_Enabled_for_OEM__c , "Yes") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Lead Management can be enabled only if Deal Registration is enabled
